title: San Francisco Street Scene

on back, in  on back, in pencil: [San Francisco Street Scene 19
description: two women--woman at right wearing a light tweed coat and sitting on a metal trash can, woman at left center wearing a dark coat and flowered headscarf seated on the corner of a chair (?)--smiling at a laughing, gesturing little boy at left
